text: This obsoletes IRM 21.2.5, Systems and Research Programs, Miscellaneous Forms and Processing.
Systems and Research Programs, Miscellaneous Forms and Processing content has either been to other IRMs, can be located in other IRMs or the procedures have been obsoleted.
